About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-3:30pm; closed school holidays. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. Copying services available for books, journals, photographs and newspapers.

About.Access: 3 days' advance notice of visit required including details of research.

About.Acquisition focus: To foster pupil and staff appreciation of and pride in the School, its history and achievements. To provide a collection of primary source material directly relating to the local community to be used as a teaching resource as an example of social history. Strengthening School-community bonds.

Contact.Street address: Corner Kaitlers Road and Kemp Street, Lavington 2641
